## Buffer class

Generic GPU data store wrapping WebGLBuffer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class Buffer extends ContextConsumer 
```
<b>Extends:</b> ContextConsumer

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)({ target, usage, size, context, })](./webgl.buffer._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Buffer</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [size](./webgl.buffer.size.md) |  | number | The buffers size in bytes |
|  [target](./webgl.buffer.target.md) |  | [BufferBindingPoint](./webgl.bufferbindingpoint.md) |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bind(target)](./webgl.buffer.bind.md) |  | Binds the buffer to a target binding point. |
|  [delete()](./webgl.buffer.delete.md) |  | Flags the underlying WebGLBuffer for deletion. The buffer cannot be bound afterwards. |
|  [getBuffer()](./webgl.buffer.getbuffer.md) |  | Returns the underlying WebGLBuffer once ready. |
|  [getBufferSync()](./webgl.buffer.getbuffersync.md) |  | Returns the underlying WebGLBuffer if it has been initialized, or <code>null</code> otherwise. Use <code>getBuffer()</code> to wait until the buffer is ready. |
